Humanities Week returned from Oct PERIOD  to  with free online and inperson events around Virginia Techs campus PERIOD

Virginia Tech mens soccer fell to No PERIOD  North Carolina Wednesday night in the first round of the ACC tournament  a loss that puts the nail in the coffin on the Hokies season PERIOD

While most of spooky seasons special events have come to pass fall is far from over with plenty of fun festivities still in store for Hokies hoping to embrace all the season has to offer PERIOD Southwest Virginia hosts events and has natural beauty for students to enjoy with family friends or

Justin Robinson  starts a drive from the alley against Tonye Jekiri  in the first half March   PERIOD

On July   the Atlantic Coast Conference announced a new media agreement with ESPN that extends through the  academic year PERIOD This new deal includes the launch of the longawaited ACC Network that is expected to hit television waves in the summer of  PERIOD

While there will be a threeyear waiting period for the cable network to launch the ACC Networks digital channel will begin this fall and carry nearly  live events PERIOD

 said ACC Commissioner John Swofford in a release PERIOD 

Swofford also said that pending on the networks success the agreement will place the ACC in the  Simply put this new agreement means more money will be flowing into the league PERIOD

It is no secret that the SEC has been the rule of the roost in terms of revenue and success  especially when it comes to football PERIOD The SEC Network generated . million in  the year it launched PERIOD During that same span the ACC only collected . million in TV revenue PERIOD

The ACC is hoping that the creation of its own network will help bridge that  million financial gap between the SEC and itself PERIOD

The league also extended its conference rights deal nine years to be effective through  PERIOD The grant of rights nearly makes it financially impossible for a school to leave PERIOD It also guarantees that a schools media rights are owned by the ACC no matter their affiliation PERIOD

What does this all mean for the Hokies

Perhaps the most important impact this will have on Virginia Tech is that it will help national recruitment for all athletic programs PERIOD Many prospects desire either national exposure for personal gain or for their families to be able to watch them play PERIOD The ACC Network will provide just that PERIOD

If you take a look at the SEC Network you will see talk shows baseball coverage softball coverage extra basketball and football coverage and more PERIOD It provides indepth exposure that is not available anywhere else PERIOD The ACCs version will likely feature a very similar slate of content PERIOD

It also means that the Hokies are going to be staying put in the ACC for at least the next two decades PERIOD The league is already recognized as one of the Power  conferences PERIOD With the improved exposure through the new network the ACC has a chance at gaining ground on the SEC and becoming one of the top two conferences in the country PERIOD

Anything that benefits the ACC will do the same for Virginia Tech and the new network will certainly help them both PERIOD
